original: nam langs pa'i dus su skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug la lag pa gru gsum gyi phyag rgya byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad la dmigs te /

analyzed: tog kha dog sna gsum gyis mchod nas tsandan dkar pos bdug la

analyzed: jig rten gyi khams stong phrag mtha yas ba dag na mchod ba dang bkur sti chen po rnam ba sna tshogs yod ba

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsams te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong chen po 'bar ba 'di nam dga' ba chen po skyes pa'i bar du brjod na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba rnams la s ba rnams yid la bsams te sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad la bul nas de bzhin gshegs ba snying po stong chen po bar ba di nam dga ba chen po skye ba ba du rjod na

analyzed: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyi drung du dug ba shes shing

analyzed: de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs ba rigs su phyir mi ldog ba skye ba yin no

original: tshe rabs gzhan du song na yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe rabs gzhan du gro na yang byang chub sems dpa sa chen po thob ba gyur ro

analyzed: rig sngags chang chen po khor los sgyur ba yang thob ba gyur ro

original: gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyang thob ba gyur ro

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyang mnyes ba byed do

original: mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon ba shes ba mi nyams ba yang thob ba gyur ro

analyzed: tshe di la yang sems can thams cad dga ba gyur ro

original: lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyis kyang srung ba gyur ro

analyzed: klu dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha lding dang mi ci dang gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad kyis kyang srung ba gyur te

original: gang la smras pa de'i bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la smras ba de byed ba sgrub ba gyur ro

analyzed: des ci bsam ba dang byed du jug ba rnams kyang lha la sogs ba rnams byed ba gyur ro

original: de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dod ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs ba gyur ro

original: sus kyang ngag mi gcog par yang 'gyur ro; ;lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang / gzugs dang / bsod nams kdang / lang tsho dang / nad med pa dang / rgyas pa 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: sus kyang ngag mi gcog ba yang gyur ro; ;lha rnams kyis kyang de stobs dang gzugs dang bsod nams kdang lang tsho dang nad med ba dang rgya ba phel ba byed do

original: bgegs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs ba gyur ro

original: mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob bar 'dod pa rnams dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gar thabs byed pa la @466a *//
analyzed: mdor na de bzhin gshegs ba grong khyer du jug ba dod ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs ba sangs rgya kyi sku chen po mthong ba dod ba rnams dang yon tan phun sum tshogs ba thams cad thob ba dod ba rnams dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa chen po bslab ba gar thabs byed ba la

original: 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i de kho na rtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang /
analyzed: jug ba dod ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa chen po chos nyid kyi dam tshig thob ba dod ba rnams dang rtag ba rgyun mi chad ba dang ba chad med ba brgyud chen po de kho na rtogs ba dod ba rnams dang

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba yon tan gyi rgyan gyis bdag nyid rgyan ba dod ba rnams kyis yon tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags ba phyir de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyis bstod cing

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pa 'di thog mar sgrim pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen po rnams kyis yang dag ba ston ba di thogs mar sgrim ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad bsam ba cho ga ji skad ston ba bzhin du blang ba byed

original: snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: snying rje mchog ces byed ba gzungs rdzogs so
